statements: SELECT * FROM content_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 5;
SELECT template_name FROM content_templates WHERE template_name LIKE 'Welcome%';
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_content ILIKE '%lorem ipsum%';
SELECT template_id, template_content FROM content_templates ORDER BY template_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_templates ORDER BY template_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_name = 'Welcome Message' AND template_content LIKE '%Hello%';
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT template_name, LENGTH(template_content) as content_length FROM content_templates ORDER BY content_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT template_name FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT template_name, content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM content_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content_categories;
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id > 10 ORDER BY template_name ASC;
SELECT c.category_name, t.template_name FROM content_categories c JOIN content_templates t ON c.category_id = t.template_id WHERE c.category_id = 2;
SELECT template_id, template_name, content FROM content_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT template_id, template_name, content FROM content_templates WHERE content IS NOT NULL AND template_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 5;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT creator_name FROM content_creators WHERE creator_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_name LIKE '%important%' OR template_content LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM content_templates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT creator_name, creator_email FROM content_creators WHERE creator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM content_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM templates;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = 3;
SELECT content_title, content_body FROM content WHERE category_id = 2 AND tag_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM templates ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT content_title, content_body FROM content WHERE category_id = 2 AND tag_id = 1 ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM templates WHERE template_name LIKE 'Temp%' OR template_name LIKE '%late';
SELECT template_name, category_name, tag_name FROM templates t INNER JOIN categories c ON t.template_id = c.category_id INNER JOIN tags ta ON t.template_id = ta.tag_id ORDER BY t.template_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentTemplates;
SELECT template_name, content FROM ContentTemplates;
SELECT * FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT template_name FROM ContentTemplates WHERE template_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, tag_name FROM ContentTemplates JOIN TemplateTags ON ContentTemplates.template_id = TemplateTags.template_id JOIN Tags ON TemplateTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM ContentTemplates;
SELECT template_name, content FROM ContentTemplates WHERE template_id = 1;

SELECT template_name, category_name FROM ContentTemplates INNER JOIN TemplateCategories ON ContentTemplates.template_id = TemplateCategories.template_id INNER JOIN Categories ON TemplateCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags WHERE tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM TemplateTags WHERE template_id = 2);
SELECT template_id, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM TemplateTags GROUP BY template_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY tag_count DESC;
